Class Dataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Hyperrectangles.EACH.Dataset

  • public class Dataset
extends java.lang.Object

    Class to manage data sets

    1.0

    , 1.1

    Author:
    Rosa Venzala, Written by Rosa Venzala (University of Granada) 02/06/2008, Modified by Xavi Solé (La Salle, Ramón Llull University - Barcelona) 16/12/2008
